## UiActionsPresentable.MenuItem property

`UiComponent` to render when displaying this entity as a context menu item. If not provided, `getDisplayName` will be used instead.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly MenuItem?: UiComponent<{
        context: Context;
    }>;
```
